Attribute.Name: WRIN Suffix Attributes for Food - Non Liquid
Attribute.ValueTemplate: <derive expr="IF(value('ProductGroup')="Food",if(value('IsLiquid')="No", concatenate( value('TradeItemFormula'), ';', value('TradeItemLanguage'), ';', value('HandlingInstructionCode'), ';', value('CaseLanguage'), ';', value('TotalPackQty'), ';', value('OpenedTradeItemLifespan'), ';', value('PackCount'), ';', value('PackQty'), ';', value('HandlingUOM'), ';', value('PackagingType')),""),"")"/>

MetaData.Value: It is used to calculate Suffix attributes for Food-NonLiquid.
